data:item.name: NAFExx388-EVB
data:item.display_title: Highly configurable, industrial-grade multichannel analog input analog front-end (AFE)
data:item.overview: The NAFExx388-EVB is easy to test and designed for the NAFExx388, which is a highly configurable, industrial-grade multichannel analog input analog front-end (AFE). The board, connected to an LPC54628 MCU board, allows for easy configuration and reading of the measurement data thanks to a dedicated GUI which is installed in the PC. The board supports voltage, current, RTD and thermocouple measurements allow for fast and easy development of the final application.
